bio: offcourse is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy. He's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he created the Superconnectors event format and founded the Innovator's Working Group of the Dutch Internet Society. With experience in traditional and non-traditional educational settings, he advocates for impactful and inclusive internet. Currently based in Taipei, Taiwan, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems.
